other_tests.findings: Confirmed that the fetus had a compound heterozygous mutation of the AGXT gene.
The expelled kidney stone was composed of 60% calcium oxalate dihydrate and 40% calcium oxalate monohydrate.

other_tests.procedure_name: Ultrasound scan of the kidneys and urinary tract
other_tests.changes_over_time: Nephrocalcinosis was detected at 3 months of age.

other_tests.findings: Two hyperechogenic images at the left lower renal pole (6 and 5 mm) and a stone (~6 mm) in the right ureter.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Improvement in nephrocalcinosis observed on scans at 12 and 20 months, with persistence of the two left kidney stones unchanged from the previous examination.
